name: Door-to-Door Sales
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants that sell merchandise by means of house-to-house
canvass, or from trucks or wagons or other temporary locations.
Products sold door-to-door may include cosmetics, household items,
bakery goods, dairy products, and magazine subscriptions.
